markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Predictable Silver Piece](/Equipment.aspx?ID=740)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This seemingly unremarkable, weathered silver coin bears the bust of an unnamed monarch on the face and a majestic bird on the tail. You can toss the coin without activating it, in which case it follows the normal laws of probability.

<document level="2" id="action-586" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Predictable Silver Piece
